website_summaries.verdict: Multifaceted study guide that includes video tutorials and reasoning sections for language arts and math.
pros: Well-rounded guide for the test taker who needs help in all subject areas as well as test taking strategies
Subdivided sections make studying easy and accessible
Written with enough detailed explanations and direct enough not to distract with superfluous information
cons: As a 400-page guide, it’s rather heavy if you intend to bring it with you to study locations
A bit dense in some areas

customer_reviews.title: Poor copying on this book for what i paid i should have got a better copy!
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it will be a great study guide to help me with getting my G.E.D. the 1st 16pages are upside down and not printed correctly where the words are falling off of the page. The 1st 16 pages plus the very beginning of the book is upside down. Im honestly not happy about that and will considering using a different company to make my book purchase from next time. I would have thought before boxing it they would check the product out 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Studying made simple
customer_reviews.text: This book is self explanatory and is easier to follow along especially as a refresher guide to the definitions I have long forgot over the years. As I continue through it and make notes, it is handy to go back and review. The outline of the SECRETS was great to read because those are all my fears about taking my exam in July. I have put this off for so many years and this book has given me the confidence to do it and go onto a further education.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use resource
customer_reviews.text: It is very helpful, and different. It adds a different vantage point. I teach GED classes in the penal system. My students enjoy the book. I like the link to online videos. They cannot use internet but I can use it my computer and we watch together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing

customer_reviews.author: Dayton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for helping as a study guide. Easy to read and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Haidee

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: GED Preparation 2019-2020 is an excellent source for test takers. I found terms highlighted throughout the text. Plenty of text both teaching and demonstrating examples to me. I had practice test questions and answers provided to me.I couldn't be happier. Explanations for everything was also included. Overall, great study guide for the price. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: krisbutler

customer_reviews.title: BEST STUDY GUIDE
customer_reviews.text: So I got my GED long before this book came out. I ordered this GED 2019 All Subjects Secrets study guide for my best friend who recently wanted to get her GED ASAP. This book is amazing!! My friend studies 2 hours a day from Mon - Fri. She’s only had the book for about three weeks and now she’s confident to take the test! I totally recommend this study guide! Good luck on your GED test!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This Guide is a Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to obtain your GED do yourself a favor and buy this study guide. There is 407 pages of useful information from test-taking strategies, teaching tips, mathematical reasoning, reasoning through language arts, science, social studies, practice test, answer explanations, and tips on how to overcome test anxiety and the fear of math. This guide does an excellent job of breaking down the learning material so that it is easier to comprehend. So don't hesitate and purchase this awesome study guide!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love the book and I wish I had it when I was about to go to college. It gives you all information on all subjects and if you know it then you pass the GED easily. This are classes that are required for everybody to pass before applying to universaty to get a step higher education like BEchelor degree.yes this is awesome book I regiment to have for those who have goals and dreams on perusing a higher education then just high school diploma.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very useful studyguide.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great studyguide! The book is about an inch thick with 415 pages of information. Plus, the book even comes with a free dvd offer. Score!!! I would recommend this studyguide if your looking for some extra strategies for passing the GED exam.
customer_reviews.author: trussell

customer_reviews.title: over 400 pages thick and filled with key terms to learn
customer_reviews.text: Lots of information to learn in here, over 400 pages, a decent resource to help your GED skills come on top if you really use it and study through all of it.
customer_reviews.author: Slade s

customer_reviews.title: Great book of knowledge
customer_reviews.text: This book has been great in preparing me for an upcoming college level exam that will be covering a wide array of subjects. I think it is a great study tool for high school and college levels. I love that the main focuses are all in this one book and I dont have to go to several books, which can be overwhelming. I will be using this book regularly in the future.
customer_reviews.author: TRUMP ROCKS

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH INFORMATION
customer_reviews.text: This book has 407 pages of information. This book is easy to read and follow along with. I like that it has a bonus link at the back of the book for more information, and after each paragraph of information it has a video link to have someone give more information on the topic
